tool_description: Matches patient symptoms against established diagnostic criteria for specific conditions to determine diagnostic likelihood.

candidate_conditions.description: Conditions to evaluate against diagnostic criteria

symptom_durations.description: Duration of each symptom (e.g., '2 days', '1 week')

criteria_source.description: Diagnostic criteria source: DSM-5, ICD-11, specialty-guidelines, standard

error_messages: Empty symptoms or conditions: Provide at least one symptom and one condition to evaluate.
Invalid criteria source: Use DSM-5, ICD-11, specialty-guidelines, or standard.
Mismatched duration array: If provided, symptom durations must match the number of symptoms.
Unrecognized condition: One or more candidate conditions are not recognized in the knowledge base.
Invalid symptom format: Symptoms must be provided as descriptive text strings.
usage: Provide patient symptoms and candidate conditions for evaluation. The tool matches symptoms against established diagnostic criteria and returns likelihood scores.

criteria_met.description: Number of diagnostic criteria met for each condition

total_criteria.description: Total diagnostic criteria for each condition

match_percentages.description: Percentage of criteria met for each condition

diagnostic_likelihood.description: Likelihood categories: definite, probable, possible, unlikely
